content: Is it possible for the LLVM build to use lld? It's currently using ld on my machine, which is much slower and uses tons of memory.

there's a separate option for that

# use-linker = "lld"
if you're not modifying llvm you can also set download-ci-llvm = true to skip building llvm
Thanks! I'm doing lots of profiling and it's useful to build with [llvm] release-debuginfo = true, which is why I build it myself.
